bioconda.name: bioconductor-rarevariantvis
bioconda.summary: A suite for analysis of rare genomic variants in whole genome sequencing data

biotools.summary: A suite for analysis of rare genomic variants in whole genome sequencing data. It annotates, filters and presents genomic variants in a global, per chromosome way.

bioschemas.name: RareVariantVis
bioschemas.summary: A suite for analysis of rare genomic variants in whole genome sequencing data. It annotates, filters and presents genomic variants in a global, per chromosome way.
